item.title: By: What's in your fridge? | Fig & Cherry
item.dc:creator: What's in your fridge? | Fig & Cherry
item.description: [...] not all sugary with Anita she also cooks up some super nice savoury stuff like her pasta with vodka cream sauce (wow, [...]
item.content:encoded: […] not all sugary with Anita she also cooks up some super nice savoury stuff like her pasta with vodka cream sauce (wow, […]

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Arwen - Yep, I think dessert would be bigger winner for me :)
Hi Steph - I know what you mean about wine in a sauce too - it just adds "something...". And talk about talking the meal up, propose-worthy food should be to-die-for food :)
Hi Alexandra - Hope you like the recipe and use up a bit of your leftover vodka :) let me know how it goes.
Hi Lorraine - He he, Nick doesn't' seem to say it had anything to do with the proposal..... but maybe in the back of his mind it did :P
Hi Maria - It was a first for me too! It doesn't add as much flavour as you would think, just an underlying subtle "something".
Hi FFichiban - :P I Know! he he, the vodka must have been more than double the recipe :) Hope you give the recipe a go!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Arwen – Yep, I think dessert would be bigger winner for me ðŸ™‚

Hi Steph – I know what you mean about wine in a sauce too – it just adds “something…”. And talk about talking the meal up, propose-worthy food should be to-die-for food ðŸ™‚

Hi Alexandra – Hope you like the recipe and use up a bit of your leftover vodka ðŸ™‚ let me know how it goes.

Hi Lorraine – He he, Nick doesn’t’ seem to say it had anything to do with the proposal….. but maybe in the back of his mind it did ðŸ˜›

Hi Maria – It was a first for me too! It doesn’t add as much flavour as you would think, just an underlying subtle “something”.

Hi FFichiban – ðŸ˜› I Know! he he, the vodka must have been more than double the recipe ðŸ™‚ Hope you give the recipe a go!

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Hee hee how much vodka did they put in it pre (and post) cooking to get a proposal! ahha jkjk I have heard of this pasta before and always meant to give it a go maybe this will be a boost of inspiration ^^!
item.content:encoded: Hee hee how much vodka did they put in it pre (and post) cooking to get a proposal! ahha jkjk I have heard of this pasta before and always meant to give it a go maybe this will be a boost of inspiration ^^!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: vodka in pasta, now that is a first for me, never heard that before. It sure is interesting though
item.content:encoded: vodka in pasta, now that is a first for me, never heard that before. It sure is interesting though

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: I love vodka pasta! I think almost enough to propose to someone! :D It looks wonderfu- I'm sure it had something to do with your proposal!
item.content:encoded: I love vodka pasta! I think almost enough to propose to someone! ðŸ˜€ It looks wonderfu- I’m sure it had something to do with your proposal!

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: MMM creamy sauce is always a good thing :) We have a lot of vodka leftover from a party we had this past weekend and I've been trying to figure out if I can use it in any dish...gotta try this one night!
item.content:encoded: MMM creamy sauce is always a good thing ðŸ™‚ We have a lot of vodka leftover from a party we had this past weekend and I’ve been trying to figure out if I can use it in any dish…gotta try this one night!

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Haha that recipe gives quite a big promise to live up to! I've never tried putting vodka in a pasta sauce but I can relate to what you say about it feeling like something is missing without it-like how adding wine to a sauce seems to give it extra depth.
item.content:encoded: Haha that recipe gives quite a big promise to live up to! I’ve never tried putting vodka in a pasta sauce but I can relate to what you say about it feeling like something is missing without it-like how adding wine to a sauce seems to give it extra depth.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I think I like the dessert proposal idea better too :) Creamy tomato sauce does sound good though, and quick and easy is even better.
item.content:encoded: I think I like the dessert proposal idea better too ðŸ™‚ Creamy tomato sauce does sound good though, and quick and easy is even better.
